灺字的基本解释

灺
xiè
没点完的蜡烛；也泛指灯烛：残灺。红灺。灺烛炜煌。
灯心燃烧后的灰：“灯灺暗飘珠蔌蔌。”
（灯烛）熄灭：“更残灯灺泪沾衣。”

灺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》徐野切，上馬，邪。］
亦作“炧1”。亦作“炨1”。
(1)灯烛余烬。
(2)指灯烛。
(3)指灯烛光。
(4)泛指余烬。
(5)指灯烛、香火熄灭。
(6)引申指毁灭。

灺字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　灺； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页666第14
【唐韻】徐野切【集韻】【韻會】似也切，?斜上聲。【說文】燭㶳。【李商隱詩】香灺燈光奈爾何。　又【集韻】待可切，音舵。本作炧。燭餘也。【五音集韻】作炨。

灺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
灺字的起名意思

暂无。

candle stub
Basic explanation of words
candle stub
xiè
Unfinished candles; also refers to light candles: Can 灺. Hong Hao. Hao Zhu Weihuang.
Ash after burning the heart of the lamp: "The lamp is dark and fluttering."
(Lamp candle) extinguished: "It's even more soaked in tears."
candle stub
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guangyun" Xu Ye cuts, mounts, evil. ]
Also known as "炧1". Also known as "炨1".
(1) Lamp candle embers.
(2) Refers to light candles.
(3) Refers to lamp candlelight.
(4) Refers to embers in general.
(5) Means that the candles and incense are extinguished.
(6) The extension refers to destruction.
candle stub
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　灺; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 666 14
[Tang Yun] Xu Ye cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Seems to cut too,? The sound goes up diagonally. [Speaking text] Candle 㶳. [Li Shangyin's Poems] Xiang Hao and lighting Nair Ho.　[Jiyun] Wait to be cut, tone rudder. This is a 炧. More than a candle. 【Pentaphonic rhyme】It is used as a stew.
